typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as string,
		Column_16 as string,
		Column_17 as string,
		Column_18 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		EmployeeID as integer,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		Title as string,
		TitleOfCourtesy as string,
		BirthDate as timestamp,
		HireDate as timestamp,
		Address as string,
		City as string,
		Region as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		Country as string,
		HomePhone as string,
		Extension as string,
		Photo as binary,
		Notes as string,
		ReportsTo as integer,
		PhotoPath as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		EmployeeID = Column_1,
		LastName = Column_2,
		FirstName = Column_3,
		Title = Column_4,
		TitleOfCourtesy = Column_5,
		BirthDate = Column_6,
		HireDate = Column_7,
		Address = Column_8,
		City = Column_9,
		Region = Column_10,
		PostalCode = Column_11,
		Country = Column_12,
		HomePhone = Column_13,
		Extension = Column_14,
		Photo = Column_15,
		Notes = Column_16,
		ReportsTo = Column_17,
		PhotoPath = Column_18
	)) ~> sink1
